short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hu Tao wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Hu Tao Genshin Impact background. Hu Tao wallpaper theme for Genshin Impact fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Every new tab displays a different Hu Tao wallpaper.
2. Choose or randomize your Hu Tao background from the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Utilize the Google Search Bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media accounts.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. Create new notes to keep track of your tasks.
7. Quickly navigate to your most frequently visited sites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for faster access.
10. Direct access to Google applications.
11. Seamless navigation to More Themes.
12. Effortless sharing options to Social Media.
13. Instant access to download wallpapers.
14. Quick links to games.
15. Enjoy dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Hu Tao new tab.
